slots.hook: Dana's laser tag party is Saturday night and you promised yellow Jell-O shots. Shar's coordinating the group, the gift's wrapped, but you still need the recipe. This is the last piece before you can fully show up and celebrate her turning 30.
slots.next_step: Search 'yellow Jell-O shot recipe vodka' and bookmark one that looks easy

slots.hook: Mariano turns 30 on the 19th and you've got this beautiful plan: a warm backpacking weekend (Mar 14-15) then Chicago for the birthday. Your Japan return already routes through Chicago, but you haven't picked where to hike or booked those flights yet. The window for cheap flights is closing fast.
slots.next_step: Search 'warm backpacking destinations March weekend USA' and save three options

slots.hook: You're landing in Osaka in 25 days with Dana for two weeks of trains, temples, and fountain pens. Flights and hotels are locked in, but Kyoto, Takayama, and Tokyo are still blank canvases. Time to turn that route into an itinerary with pen shops, outdoor adventures, and ways to celebrate Dana's 30th in Japan.
slots.next_step: Open the Japan trip doc and list 3 must-do activities for Kyoto
